sourcesContent:
export const COLORS = {
  background: '#F7F9FC', 
  card: '#FFFFFF',
  text: '#333D4B',
  textSecondary: '#6B778D',
  accent1: '#8DB5EE', // Gentle Blue
  accent2: '#80D8C3', // Calm Teal
  accent3: '#F3B7A8', // Warm Peach
  shadow: 'rgba(107, 119, 141, 0.2)',
  inputBackground: '#EDF2F7',
  button: '#8DB5EE',
  buttonText: '#FFFFFF',
  mediatorBubble: '#EBF2FB',
  userBubble: '#8DB5EE', 
  userBubbleText: '#FFFFFF',
  breatherGradientStart: '#80D8C3',
  breatherGradientEnd: '#A0E5D3',
};
